verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
(Which <S%G3739><s%> he had promised <S%G4279>afore<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G1124>Scriptures,)<s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%>

And <S%G3724>declared<s%> to be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G42>holiness,<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the dead: <S%G3498><s%>

By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship,<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3686>name;<s%>
Among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G2822>called<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome,<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

First, <S%G4412><s%> <S%G3303>I<s%> <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is spoken <S%G2605>of<s%> <S%G1722><s%> throughout <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G5613>that<s%> without <S%G89>ceasing<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4335>prayers;<s%>

Making <S%G1189>request,<s%> if by any <S%G1513>means<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>length<s%> I might have a prosperous <S%G2137>journey<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1971>long<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G3330>impart<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift,<s%> to the end <S%G5209>ye<s%> may be <S%G4741>established;<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>That<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> that I may be comforted <S%G4837>together<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1722>mutual<s%> <S%G240><s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> have you <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4178>oftentimes<s%> I <S%G4388>purposed<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>(but<s%> was <S%G2967>let<s%> <S%G891>hitherto,)<s%> <S%G1204><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3781>debtor<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G915>Barbarians;<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G453>unwise.<s%>

So, <S%G3779><s%> as much as in me <S%G2596>is,<s%> <S%G1691><s%> I am <S%G4289>ready<s%> to preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G4100>believeth;<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5037>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> is the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> who <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness;<s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> that which may be <S%G1110>known<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G5319>showed<s%> it unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> invisible <S%G517>things<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> are clearly <S%G2529>seen,<s%> being <S%G3539>understood<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> things that <S%G4161>are<s%> made, <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G126>eternal<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2305>Godhead;<s%> so that <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1511>are<s%> without excuse: <S%G379><s%>

Because <S%G1360>that,<s%> when they <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> him <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>neither<s%> were <S%G2168>thankful;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> became <S%G3154>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G1261>imaginations,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G801>foolish<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened.<s%>
Professing <S%G5335><s%> themselves to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4680>wise,<s%> they became <S%G3471>fools,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G236>changed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> an <S%G1504>image<s%> made like <S%G3667>to<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4071>birds,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fourfooted <S%G5074>beasts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> gave them <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> to <S%G818>dishonor<s%> their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G1722>between<s%> themselves: <S%G1438><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3337>changed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4573>worshiped<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3000>served<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%> more <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2936>Creator,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G1519>forever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

For this <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> gave them <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G819>vile<s%> <S%G3806>affections:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2338>women<s%> did <S%G3337>change<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> which is <S%G3844>against<s%> nature: <S%G5449><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G730>men,<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2338>woman,<s%> <S%G1572>burned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3715>lust<s%> one toward <S%G240>another;<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G2716>working<s%> that which is <S%G808>unseemly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G618>receiving<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> that <S%G489>recompense<s%> of <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1163>meet.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> they did <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1381>like<s%> to <S%G2192>retain<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G1922>knowledge,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> gave them <S%G3860>over<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> those things which are not <S%G2520>convenient;<s%> <S%G3361><s%>

Being <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G2549>maliciousness;<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G5408>murder,<s%> <S%G2054>debate,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G2550>malignity;<s%> <S%G5588>whisperers,<s%>

Backbiters, <S%G2637><s%> haters of <S%G2319>God,<s%> <S%G5197>despiteful,<s%> <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G213>boasters,<s%> <S%G2182>inventors<s%> of evil <S%G2556>things,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%>
Without <S%G801>understanding,<s%> covenant <S%G802>breakers,<s%> without natural <S%G794>affection,<s%> <S%G786>implacable,<s%> unmerciful: <S%G415><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G1921>knowing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1345>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they which <S%G4238>commit<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G4909>pleasure<s%> in them that <S%G4238>do<s%> them.
